message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is there any flexibility on the price?

I understand that $8000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll sell it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not willing to go as low as $9500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11000 and $9500. I can offer it to you for $10000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9000. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer it to you for $9250. This is my last compromise, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your last concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8800. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good price. I can offer it to you for $9500, but I'm only doing this because I don't want to sell it to someone else. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still not willing to pay $9500. I'm willing to meet you at $8000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to sell it to me for $8000, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $8000.
